txt.en: Inspired by your efforts in Blackroot Vale, Lady Rosfin of Morlad hopes you can aid the people of Lamedon.

'Ah, I do not believe I have seen you before, traveller, but... Lady Rosfin, that is a name I know!\n\n'You say you wish to aid the people of this land? I do not claim to speak for them all, but if you aid my family and me, I know we would be grateful!'

Gladion can be found in the village of DÃ­nadab in Lamedon, across Tarlang's Neck.\n\nLady Rosfin has asked you to seek out a man named Gladion. She hopes you can bring aid to the people of Lamedon as well.

'You have done so much to aid us, [placeholder]. Although you weren't able to defeat this self-styled... heir, you have pushed him from the vale, and for that, we cannot thank you enough.

'To the south-east, you will find Tarlang's Neck, a narrow, rocky trail through the hills leading deeper into Gondor. If such problems plague us this far north, I worry greatly for the people of Lamedon.

'On my last journey home from visiting Calembel, I met a man named Gladion near Tarlang's Neck. You should speak to him for he may know more of what troubles our lands.'
Travel into Lamedon and speak to Gladion
